msbt.message: Look at you, sending out promo gifts like a boss.
Aww, you remembered that I like things!
I am uber happy that you decided to surprise me with a gift.
I really loved le gift you sent me. That's French for "the gift!"
You totally made my day with that gift.
Your letter was like a blockbuster movie—I came for the explosions, but I stayed for the heartfelt tears.
I love it when I get letters, especially ones written by deep thinkers like you.
If my reply smells particularly caffeinated, it's because I was drinking coffee when I wrote it.
There's so much I'd write if I had a giant card and the ability to write extremely small letters...
Can you tell how much thought I put into this card? I knew you'd appreciate something personal.
Next time, let's talk in person!
